languages.text: {n}Хищно ухмыльнувшись, Инцендия заинтересовано смотрит на вас.{/n} "Само провидение Императора привело тебя сюда, на мой трибунал. Для меня будет удовольствием обличить тебя в свершенных преступлениях".

{n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."
languages.original_text: {n}Хищно ухмыльнувшись, Инцендия заинтересовано смотрит на вас.{/n} "Само провидение Императора привело тебя сюда, на мой трибунал. Для меня будет удовольствием обличить тебя в свершенных преступлениях".

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅看着你，脸上带着掠食者般的笑意。{/n}“肯定是帝皇指引你来到我的宫殿，我很乐意指控你犯下的罪行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅看着你，脸上带着掠食者般的笑意。{/n}“肯定是帝皇指引你来到我的宫殿，我很乐意指控你犯下的罪行。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは捕食者のような笑みであなたを観察した。{/n}「きっと皇帝がお前をこの場所にに導いてくれたのだろう。喜んでお前が犯した罪を起訴しよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは捕食者のような笑みであなたを観察した。{/n}「きっと皇帝がお前をこの場所にに導いてくれたのだろう。喜んでお前が犯した罪を起訴しよう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia te estudia con una sonrisa predadora.{/n} «Ha debido ser la providencia del Emperador lo que le ha traído hasta mi corte. Será un placer condenar{mf|le|la} por los crímenes que ha cometido».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia te estudia con una sonrisa predadora.{/n} «Ha debido ser la providencia del Emperador lo que le ha traído hasta mi corte. Será un placer condenar{mf|le|la} por los crímenes que ha cometido».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia mustert dich mit einem räuberischen Lächeln.{/n} "Es muss die Vorsehung des Imperators gewesen sein, die Euch in mein Gericht geführt hat. Es wäre mir ein Vergnügen, Euch für Eure Verbrechen anzuklagen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia mustert dich mit einem räuberischen Lächeln.{/n} "Es muss die Vorsehung des Imperators gewesen sein, die Euch in mein Gericht geführt hat. Es wäre mir ein Vergnügen, Euch für Eure Verbrechen anzuklagen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia vous dévisage, un sourire carnassier aux lèvres.{/n} « Ce doit être la providence de l'Empereur qui vous envoie devant ma cour. Je vais me faire un plaisir de vous condamner pour les crimes que vous avez commis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia vous dévisage, un sourire carnassier aux lèvres.{/n} « Ce doit être la providence de l'Empereur qui vous envoie devant ma cour. Je vais me faire un plaisir de vous condamner pour les crimes que vous avez commis. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia, vahşi bir gülümsemeyle seni inceliyor.{/n} "Seni sarayıma getiren şey, İmparator'un takdiriilahisi olmalı. İşlediğin suçları sıralamak benim için bir zevk olur."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia studies you with a predatory smile.{/n} "It must have been the Emperor's providence that brought you here to my court. It would be my pleasure to indict you for the crimes you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia vahşi bir gülümsemeyle seni inceliyor.{/n} "Seni sarayıma getiren şey İmparator'un takdiriilahisi olmalı. İşlediğin suçları sıralamak benim için bir zevk olur."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
